verses.verse: He that dwells<WH3427> in the secret<WH5643> place of the most<WH5945> High<WH5945> shall abide<WH3885> under the shadow<WH6738> of the Almighty.<WH7706>
I will say<WH559> of the LORD,<WH3068> He is my refuge<WH4268> and my fortress:<WH4686> my God;<WH430> in him will I trust.<WH982>
Surely<WH3588> he shall deliver<WH5337> you from the snare<WH6341> of the fowler,<WH3353> and from the noisome<WH1942> pestilence.<WH1698>
He shall cover<WH5526> you with his feathers,<WH84> and under<WH8478> his wings<WH3671> shall you trust:<WH2620> his truth<WH571> shall be your shield<WH6793> and buckler.<WH5507>
You shall not be afraid<WH3372> for the terror<WH6343> by night;<WH3915> nor for the arrow<WH2671> that flies<WH5774> by day;<WH3119>
Nor for the pestilence<WH1698> that walks<WH1980> in darkness;<WH652> nor for the destruction<WH6986> that wastes<WH7736> at noonday.<WH6672>
A thousand<WH505> shall fall<WH5307> at your side,<WH6654> and ten<WH7233> thousand<WH7233> at your right<WH3225> hand;<WH3225> but it shall not come<WH5066> near<WH5066> you.
Only<WH7535> with your eyes<WH5869> shall you behold<WH5027> and see<WH7200> the reward<WH8011> of the wicked.<WH7563>
Because<WH3588> you have made<WH7760> the LORD,<WH3068> which is my refuge,<WH4268> even the most<WH5945> High,<WH5945> your habitation;<WH4583>
There shall no<WH3808> evil<WH7451> befall<WH579> you, neither<WH3808> shall any plague<WH5061> come<WH7126> near<WH7126> your dwelling.<WH168>
For he shall give his angels<WH4397> charge<WH6680> over you, to keep<WH8104> you in all<WH3605> your ways.<WH1870>
They shall bear<WH5375> you up in their hands,<WH3709> lest<WH6435> you dash<WH5062> your foot<WH7272> against a stone.<WH68>
You shall tread<WH1869> on the lion<WH7826> and adder:<WH6620> the young<WH3715> lion<WH3715> and the dragon<WH8577> shall you trample<WH7429> under feet.<WH6471>
Because<WH3588> he has set his love<WH2836> on me, therefore will I deliver<WH6403> him: I will set him on high,<WH7682> because<WH3588> he has known<WH3045> my name.<WH8034>
He shall call<WH7121> on me, and I will answer<WH6030> him: I will be with him in trouble;<WH6869> I will deliver<WH2502> him, and honor<WH3519> him.
With long<WH753> life<WH3117> will I satisfy<WH7646> him, and show<WH7200> him my salvation.<WH3444>
